subject: Re: [junit] class cast exception
msgSnippet: ... The answer is available in the JUnit FAQ under the I get a ClassNotFoundException when I use the LoadingTestRunner section:
messageBody:
yours_jeeva wrote:

> Just to add on to the previous post:
>
> I also tried this:
> Added a file exculded.properties with a try for the home interface
> which causes the class cast exception while narrowing.
> Now i am not sure where to place it.
> I placed it in a folder c:/junit/util/
> and added c:/ to my classpath before junit.jar
> Is that right?
> Also i tried to place the full c:/junit/util/exclded.properties
> in the classpath before junit.jar
> Neithier of them seem to work.
> Am i missing something here.
> Any help would be appreciated.

The answer is available in the JUnit FAQ under the "I get a
ClassNotFoundException when I use the LoadingTestRunner" section:

http://JUnit.sourceforge.net/doc/faq/faq.htm

Regards,

Mike
